name: httpbin
description: Freely hosted in HTTP & HTTPS flavors.

endpoints./cookies/set?name=value: Sets one or more simple cookies.
endpoints./cookies/delete?name: Deletes one or more simple cookies.
endpoints./drip?numbytes=n&duration=s&delay=s: Drips data over a duration after an optional initial delay.
endpoints./cache: Returns 200 unless an If-Modified-Since or If-None-Match header is provided, when it returns a 304.
endpoints./cache/:n: Sets a Cache-Control header for n seconds.
endpoints./bytes/:n: Generates n random bytes of binary data, accepts optional seed integer parameter.
endpoints./stream-bytes/:n: Streams n random bytes of binary data, accepts optional seed and chunk_size integer parameters.
endpoints./links/:n: Returns page containing n HTML links.
